title: Zaza Pachulia - Wikipedia
snippet: Zaza Pachulia (Georgian: ზაზა ... [zaza patʃʰulia] born Zaur Pachulia; 10 February 1984) is a Georgian professional basketball executive and former player who is a basketball operations consultant for the Golden State Warriors of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Beginning his professional career in Turkey as a teenager, Pachulia was drafted in the second round of the 2003 NBA draft by the Orlando Magic. He played for seven teams in his 16-year ...

title: Zaza Pachulia on what lured him to join Golden State Warriors - Basketball Network
snippet: Throughout his career, Pachulia was known in the NBA as a great backup center who brought toughness and energy to teams like the Orlando Magic, Atlanta Hawks, Milwaukee Bucks, and Dallas Mavericks before coming to the Bay.

title: Zaza Pachulia facts for kids
snippet: He scored 22 points and grabbed 21 rebounds, which was a record for the Bucks team. In 2015, Zaza was traded to the Dallas Mavericks. In his first game with them, he scored 10 points and had 10 rebounds.
